page.title: 10People's Jobs in Creeting
page.content: Although the majority of land in Creeting is used for farming, only about 2% of the population of 800 is employed in it. Most of these people are working with cereal crops and pigs, though a few are involved in growing fruit and vegetables. Much of the population commute into Needham Market, Stowmarket, Ipswich, Martlesham and even London. Their work is varied. Several are involved in computer design and technology, electronics and accountancy. Other jobs include clerical work, teaching, child evangelism, plumbing and building. Several people move around: lorry drivers,groundsmen and insurancemen. Out of the people covered in this survey the unemployment rate was low.
